title: The Beika City Shopping Center Garbage Bin Mystery

sections.Situation: Conan, Haibara, and the Detective Boys found out that each morning new trash are appearing at the site where there used to be a garbage bin. Meanwhile, there is an arguement between Beika shopping center store association members about whether they should use store association budget to reinstall new garbage bin. At the same moment, Ran's teacher asked the class to submit ideas for entertaining the guests coming to Tokyo for WSG.

sections.Resolution: The store association members then decide to reinstall garbage bin, but the budget is not enough to cover. Ran, Sonoko, and Sera then come and suggest the members to use their "garbage takeout bag". It is actually an ordinary tote bag with Japanese-style pattern, but one can put garbage bag inside it to take the garbage with them. They also suggest selling the bag as souvenirs for foreigners. The store association members then agree with Ran's idea.
